What is Azure AI Studio:

    - AI Studio is a platform to develop production-ready enterprise-grade AI tools ex.
Copilots, apps, solutions and workflows

    - AI Studio is a collection of AI models and services

Features of Azure AI Studio:
    - Collection of great AI services and models at your fingertips
    - Complete AI toolchain (search, data, web functions, etc)
    - Production Ready and Enterprise Grade
    - Allows tracing and debugging
    - Create once, deploy everywhere

AI Studio Architecture:
    - Top Level is AI Hub
        - Contains Data Upload and Artifacts
        - Connections
        - Compute
        - Security
    - Within is AI Project
        - It is the child environment
        - Consists of Datasets, Models, Indexes
        - AI tools
